maybe i'm just exhausted but....

i'm staring at my last name right now. and it seems completely foreign to me. my first thought was "hames? whats hames? what a funny sounding word." i feel like i'm looking at this name for the first time in my life. so i'm sitting here repeating my name over and over again. "margaret hames. margaret logan hames". it still looks ridiculous. maybe i identify with the logan side of me so much that sometimes i forget hames is actually my last name. i write it out of habit. hames is a silly word. h a m (as in mary) e s. like james with an h. maybe smoking so much is making me stupid. or maybe i just can't stand my last name. or maybe it really means nothing to me and i need to get rid of it. anyway, i'm hungry. but i just realized that hames rhymes with like a million things. frames, lames, shames, dames, fames, cames, games, james, mames, names, sames, and tames.
not hamies, not hamas, not ham-es, not hanes, not ames, but hames. weird.

...is as follows......

me in the kithen. pour out what i think are french fries on to a cookie sheet. then pick up a box of what i think are chicken fingers, and pour them onto the sheet. i then realize that the first thing i placed on the sheet was in fact "chicken fritters" and therefore am looking at 2 different versions of the same thing. i shrug it off and decide that variety is a good thing. as i'm placing the chicken products back in the freezer, i look at hte bag of chocolate chip and peanut butter cookies. and think to myself, i wonder why there are still chocolate chip cookies in there. probably because everyone else likes the peanut butter ones. either that are i'm the only one taking cookies from teh freezer. then i think to myself: i know i would be taking cookies. i think pour my glass of milk and realize that my chicken isn't going to cook itself on top of the oven. i them proceded to place the lid to the milk in my glass to close it. i then decided this whole thing was to great to forget, and now i'm struggling to remember it. i need to go put my food in teh oven. and clean up after the party i had 2 nights ago.

so classes were good today. erica found me wandering around campus lost as usual. shes so nice. after class i headed home and thats when the drama began. i got back to the house and decided to turn my tv so it faced the back room where my computer was stationed. the cable managed to get unplugged. so i went to pull out the tv and my cactus got knocked over behind the tv and i got dirt everywhere. then as i went to move the tv forward the tv fell and hit me in the head as it fell to the ground. i panicked and dropped the tv stand on my foot. so after i stopped cursing and screaming and my headache died down, i composed myself and set about fixing the connection. shortly thereafter i was electrocuted as i bumped into my fish tank. i finally got it working and decided i deserved a nap. about an hour into my nap, i had a dream that i slammed my finger in a car door. i turned out that  elliot had just bitten a chunk out of my finger. he also chewed up the egg crate thing on my mattress. then i drove to jims at a whopping 55 miles an hour due to the fact that because of 2 wide load vehicles, traffic had been reduced to one lane.

i would like to finish this update with a question.
what kind of friend calls you while you're having sex with your boyfriend to tell you that she just saw your ex and he looks "wicked hot"?

first day of classes, pretty sweet. rachel and dave are both in my freshman english class which rocks. law in american life seems like its going to be really interesting. i'm pretty excited. english seems like its going to be really icky and annoying. i have to go back to durham tomorrow to get my books. i need like a million and a half. its going to cost an arm and a leg. bummer. i also made a friend. her names erica and shes a senior. she lives in dover and is a total hippie. she gave me her screen name, and told me i could stay at her place sometime. wicked sweet. i also saw like 5 kids from winnacunnet. excellent. so yeah, i think thats pretty much it. so now i'm going to take a little nap. cool dude.

so last night i went and saw jim. i was really nervous on the way there cuz as usual i was expecting the worse. but it turned out pretty well. we just lied there and held each other and talked. our relationship was kinda destined for failure from the start. he told me that the only way it could end was with him breaking my heart. cuz ultimately it comes down to the fact that hes leaving. i can break it off earlier, but it will still hurt as much as if i waited til the end. he told me to remember one thing and that was that he loves me. he told me i was amazing. that he didn't think i quite understood just how amazing i was. i told him he made me feel good about myself, that he made me feel beautiful. and he told me that someone should have told me that everyday of my life. to the outside observer, it would appear that we hated each other. but when we're alone, its perfect. we don't fight constantly, we don't argue, we just love and appreciate each other. he keeps telling me he wasn't supposed to get attached. i say its better to have loved and lost. it would be so much worse spending you life wondering what could have been. hes trying to leave now, just his loose ends so it doesn't hurt as much. but what about me? and apart from that, we all know its just going to make the whole situation worse. so now i guess we've kinda resolved to do nothing and just wait it out. enjoy each others company. this whole thing sucks. oh well. time for a smoke.

hmm.. yesterday. feeling depressed. i went to the toast with lauren. i guess she wants to get an apartment in portsmouth, which would be wicked fucking chill, and she thinks it would be cool if i joined her. that was cool,but like a typical maggie,  i started feeling like shit after i got home. i had nothing to do. i was so fucking bored i thought i was going insane. i ended up going down to the beach and lauren, melissa, zhanna, and gwynne made it a point to cheer me up. i kinda wandered back and fourth between the three stores and kept everyone company til closing time. i went and talked to william brennan, my first crush, who works at the lemonade place, and he gave me a free smoothie. then gwynne picked up from kris and we went for a wicked burn run, complete with cyndi lauper. we had such awesome conversations. shes so rad. shes the new friend i kept hoping i would make. unfortunately, yesterday was her last day at eride, and now she heads off to umf. but shes got an apartment there, and wants me to come and visit, so i'm wicked stoked. it was great cuz after i got back i started having this wicked deep conversation with zhanna about weed and how she really needed to try it. hehehehe. for those of you who don't know zhanna, shes from belarus and speaks russian. shes also wicked awesome. oh! i also got my own weed from gwynne who traded me a couple grams for lighters and a pouch. yeah, pretty sweet. speaking of which, no ones home so i'm going to go rock ambrosia. i still need a picture of that. anyway, off to get stoned. see ya.

blah. so last night i saw jim. i have no idea how this is going to end. i seriously think we're both slowly driving each other mad. he says he loves me. he doesn't want to but he does. he also says i'm a raging bitch. i have no idea. i don't know where i'm going with this. when i started typing it had a point. when i remember what that was, i think i'll finish this.

last night. nuts. today. nuts. i started my first tattoo. i almost passed out twice. so now i ahve to go back on tuesday. it was not pleasant. i'll post the photo when the outlines done. my boy is breaking my heart. i think i'm just depressed and thats really not helping much. i was sad as it was, and i just wanted to be with him, cuz he always makes me feel so much better. but now, my mom is gone, and ems in portsmouth for the night. i just want someone to cuddle with me and make me feel better. i wanna show someone my new tattoo. blah. i don't even have cigarettes. or weed. this sucks.

(hampton beach is full of) bitchez and hos and bitchez and hos! but all i really want is a slut!!!!" yeah, it was excellent. so i finally drecided to get my nipples pierced and holy shit did it hurt. good god. not something i would recommend ever. infact, they hurt so bad i'm actually considering taking them out. i can't even move without being in like horrible pain. i want to walk around without a shirt on. lauren and i are both going to get tattooes on friday, so it should be fun. i'm really excited. what i'm not excited about though is the fact that i have perpetually hard nipples. thats really awkward. anyway, i need food. see ya.

warped tour. sucked. but as usual, i always make the best of things. i spent the day with andrea and fatty patty.the drive there got us wicked pumped. it was really far and we were all half asleep. but we were listneing to the most random silly music ever and everyone was laughing and smiling at us. i busted out the bubbles patty gave me for my birthday and we played with those. when we got there you could pretty much tell the crowd sucked big time. we went to see big d, but it was wicked lame and i couldn't enjoy myself. so i smoked some salvia, and andrea and i bought a 30 pound bag of ice in exchange for free beer and energy drinks. once we were thoroughly sloshy we decided to play in the mud. that rapidly grew, and before we knew it, it went from the three of us to about 50 of us running, sliding, swimming and battling it out in the mud. then came the crowd participation segment where they starting throwing mud at us. we then became a unified fighting force and kicked a little ass. the kids in the crowd sucked, but the kids in the mud fucking rocked. it was so great. they were all so nice, and were just totally there to have a great time. they made my day. we had all kinds of people stopping us and taking pictures. we had magazines and newspapers making us pose for them. we even made a mud person pyramid. it was fantastic. 
oh, and my birthday. em and i went to the gym at around 10 on the 13th. then we went to the toast and everyone called me around midnight to wish me a happy birthday. i then went and bought my first legal pack of cigarettes. hooray! that day i went to work and everyone wished me a happy birthday and i felt so special! then after i went and got jim and patricia and we went back to my house and at tacos and ice cream cake with mom, jj, and myra. jj, as usual made me a special birthday drink of rum with a little coke to taste. i got all giggly and cuddly. it was so much fun. i love my friends. we took jim home and then patty and i watched lotr 3. it was one of the best birthdays ever. i just felt so cool and special. i love my friends. i know i just said that, but i really felt the need to repeat it. alright, well now i'm going to go to dinner and get pierced with lauren and boy. bye!

i went into the woods because i wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if i could learn what it had to teach, and not, when i came to die, discover that i had not lived. i did not wish to live what was not life, living is so dear; nor did i wish to practice resignation unless is was quite necessary. i wanted to live life deep and suck out all of the marrow of life, to live so sturdily and spartanlike as to put to rout all that was not life, to cut a broad swath and shave it close, to drive life into a corner, and reduce it to its lowest terms, and, if it proved to be mean, why then to get the whole and genuine meanness of it, and publish its meanness to the world; or if it were sublime, to know it by experience, and be able to give a true account of it in my next excursion.

dear grammy,
i miss you. em was making me pancakes this morning, and we were out of eggs. she was like "go get some downstairs...." then she realized what she said. it kills me inside not having you here. i hate it. theres a woman in one of the cabins who looks just like you. i always see her and want to run up to her and give her a hug. i know its not you, but i wish more than anything it was. i'm applying to college now. its scary,but i'm looking forward to it. i'm trying to quit smoking. i wish you were around to help me. its so stressful. i feel like i'm going mad. i keep seeing you every where. remember that picture i took of you last year? the one where you're sitting at your desk reading? you have the best smile on your face. i see that photo all the time. when i come down stairs i can smell you. i miss you so much. i remember in the summer how when you'd make coffee in the morning, it would drift up to my window and i knew you were awake. i miss that smell. please come back.i can't imagine living the rest of my life without ever hearing your voice, your laugh. i can't imagine never being hugged by you again. it just doesn't seem possible. i feel like someday you will come back. but i know tahts not true. i want to call your house. i have your number in my phone. 926-7581. i still talk about you like you're alive. you are alive. you can't be gone. i just want you to come back. please grammy. theres so much i want to show you, and theres so much you need to show me. i need you. please come back. i miss you.
love,
miss margaret.
